title: Coconut Lime Chia Pudding
directions: Whisk together all ingredients in a large bowl until well combined. Allow mixture to sit for 3-5 minutes, then whisk again a bit.
Pour into cups, bowls, or jars. Refrigerate until completely chilled (up to overnight). The mixture will thicken over time.
Serve with fresh fruit and nuts or granola for tastiest results!
ingredients: 1 cup full-fat coconut milk (I used Thai Kitchen)
1- 1½ Tbsp honey (or apple honey or agave for vegan option)
